name: Greater Restoration

m.text: diamond dust worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: You imbue a creature you touch with positive energy to undo a debilitating effect. You can reduce the target's {@condition exhaustion} level by one, or end one of the following effects on the target:

items: One effect that {@condition charmed} or {@condition petrified} the target
One curse, including the target's attunement to a cursed magic item
Any reduction to one of the target's ability scores
One effect reducing the target's hit point maximum
